prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Crew Neck T-Shirt Eyelet Edition in Sunset Orange, 100% gassed cotton.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for garment placement. IMPORTANT: Maintain realistic t-shirt proportions - the width-to-height ratio should match a natural crew neck t-shirt with short sleeves. Do NOT stretch or elongate the garment vertically.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets at the hem (lower center area of the shirt). The eyelets are BLACK/dark metal, not silver.
- COLLAR: Classic crew neck collar, neatly shaped and round.
- SLEEVES: Short sleeves spread naturally to the sides.
- Ron Dorff label visible at the inside neckline.

STYLING: T-shirt laid perfectly flat with relaxed, natural proportions. Sleeves spread naturally to the sides. Smooth 100% gassed cotton texture visible throughout.

COLOR: CRITICAL - Copy the EXACT gradient from the input image. This t-shirt has an OMBRE/DIP-DYE effect: lighter pink-toned orange at the TOP, fading to deeper vibrant orange at the BOTTOM. Match this gradient EXACTLY as shown in the input. Do NOT make it solid orange - preserve the gradient transition.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. No harsh shadows. Do NOT overexpose or wash out the vibrant orange color.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. The t-shirt should look naturally proportioned and relaxed.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the eyelets on Ron Dorff Crew Neck T-Shirt Eyelet Edition in Sunset Orange, 100% gassed cotton.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets are positioned at the lower hem area of the t-shirt
- Show the smooth gassed cotton fabric texture surrounding the eyelets
- The hem/edge of the shirt should be visible

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot. Garment laid flat. Show fabric texture and eyelet detail clearly.

COLOR: Copy the EXACT color from the input image - this t-shirt has an ombre gradient (lighter pink-orange at top, deeper orange at bottom). Show the correct portion of this gradient based on where the eyelets are positioned (near the hem = deeper orange area).

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show the black metal finish of the eyelets against the orange fabric.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
prompts.collar:
Detail shot of the collar/neckline on Ron Dorff Crew Neck T-Shirt Eyelet Edition in Sunset Orange, 100% gassed cotton.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Classic crew neck collar construction
- Show the Ron Dorff label at the inside neckline
- Smooth 100% gassed cotton texture visible
- Clean, neat stitching around the collar band

COMPOSITION: Top-down 45-degree angle showing collar construction. T-shirt partially visible below collar.

COLOR: Copy the EXACT ombre gradient from the input image - lighter pink-orange at top fading to deeper orange at bottom. The collar area should show the LIGHTER portion of this gradient.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
prompts.sleeves:
Detail shot of the sleeve construction on this crew neck t-shirt.

WHAT TO PHOTOGRAPH:
- Short sleeve of the t-shirt, showing the full sleeve from shoulder seam to hem
- Smooth gassed cotton texture clearly visible
- Sleeve hem finishing/edge detail with clean stitching

COMPOSITION:
- T-shirt laid flat, camera focused on ONE sleeve
- Top-down 45-degree angle
- Show the sleeve spread naturally to the side
- Include part of the shoulder seam for context

GARMENT DETAILS FROM INPUT IMAGE:
- Copy the EXACT fabric texture from the input - smooth, high-quality gassed cotton
- Clean double-stitched hem at sleeve edge
- Natural sleeve shape and fit

COLOR: Copy the EXACT ombre gradient from the input image - lighter pink-orange at top, deeper orange at bottom. The sleeve area should show the appropriate portion of this gradient based on its position on the garment.

STYLING: Sleeve laid flat and smooth, showing the relaxed fit and construction quality.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional e-commerce studio lighting. Clean, even, well-lit exposure. No dark shadows, no moody lighting. This should look like a bright, clean product photo - NOT dark or underexposed.

BACKGROUND: LIGHT warm gray studio surface - bright and clean, not dark.
